body: As I mentioned above I don't think it's necessary to add the custom deleter to PyFunctions because Python will start adding the THPFunctions that own the PyFunctions to a delete queue after only 50 of them.  I could undo the changes to PyFunction if we think that's good.
body_html: As I mentioned above I don't think it's necessary to add the custom deleter to PyFunctions because Python will start adding the THPFunctions that own the PyFunctions to a delete queue after only 50 of them. I could undo the changes to PyFunction if we think that's good.
body_text: As I mentioned above I don't think it's necessary to add the custom deleter to PyFunctions because Python will start adding the THPFunctions that own the PyFunctions to a delete queue after only 50 of them.  I could undo the changes to PyFunction if we think that's good.
